battle_potion.name: Battle Potion
battle_potion.description: Increases chance of victory for the next battle. Scales depending on level difference from +1 for Grumbos who are 20 levels higher than you to +5 if the same level or lower. Can have multiple active at the same time but only 1 will be used up every battle. Unaffected by level difference modifiers. Against bosses, deals an extra 3 damage.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Decreases chance of victory by 5% for the next battle. Lose 5 extra HP per battle.

fools_gold.name: Fools Gold
fools_gold.description: Only 1 time, if you were to lose gold in battle (not challenge), the Fools Gold will be lost instead.

pilfer.name: Pilfer
pilfer.description: Lose between 50-100 gold when you lose a battle.

gold_boost_1.name: Gold Boost 1
gold_boost_1.description: Gain between 25-75 gold when you win a battle.

charm_of_wumbo.name: Charm of Wumbo
charm_of_wumbo.description: Increases minimum battle victory chance to 20%. Calculated after all other chance modifiers. Doesn't work against bosses.

flimsy_rope.name: Flimsy Rope
flimsy_rope.description: Has a 20% chance of avoiding any post battle Grumbo active effects (good or bad). Gets used up even if an effect wasn't avoided.

berserk_potion.name: Berserk Potion
berserk_potion.description: Increases victory chance by 5%. Every battle, the victory chance increased goes down by 1%, all the way down to -5% in the last battle. The same chance modifier is also applied to extra (or loss) damage done against bosses. Can only have 1 active at a time.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: 10% chance to decrease chance of victory by 100%.

poison_charm.name: Poison Charm
poison_charm.description: Prevents poison. Poison that is already active will remain active. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.description: Reduces battle stock and HP to 0.

wild_swing.name: Wild Swing
wild_swing.description: Warrior only. POW/8 % chance of increasing chance of victory by 10%. Against bosses, deals an extra 10 damage.

observation.name: Observation
observation.description: Adventurer only. 10% chance to erase the level experience penalty.

outsmart.name: Outsmart
outsmart.description: 35% chance to double the WIS bonus chance in battle. Against bosses, increases damage dealt by initial WIS bonus chance as well.

second_chance.name: Second Chance
second_chance.description: When you lose, 4% chance to win instead.

vision.name: Vision
vision.description: 20% chance to reduce damage to by you RES.

permaboost.name: Permaboost
permaboost.description: Randomly gain a permanent +1 boost to any character stat (POW, WIS, DEF, etc.)

brojob.name: Brojob
brojob.description: Heal for 20 HP and gain some pocket change of 20 gold.

bleed.name: Bleed
bleed.description: Bleed for extra damage based on duration. Also reduces your DEF and RES by 5 until it's gone.

grumbot_miner.name: Grumbot Miner
grumbot_miner.description: Grumbot mines for 10 battles, retrieving 90-150 gold after each battle.

throwing_shield.name: Throwing Shield
throwing_shield.description: Throw a shield at an enemy in battle. Increases chance of victory by DEF/3. Deals an extra 6 damage against bosses.

venom.name: Venom
venom.description: Inflicts poison before phase results. If you have an antidote in your inventory, it will destroy an antidote instead of inflicting poison.

venom_bite.name: Venom Bite
venom_bite.description: Deals 3 extra damage. Multiplies total damage by 5 if the target is poisoned.

equalizer.name: Equalizer
equalizer.description: Activates when below 120 HP. If you have less than POW 85 or WIS 85 or RES 8, receive damage equal to the difference between your POW and WIS. Only activates once.

red_eye.name: Red Eye
red_eye.description: Activates in Phase 1 against Crimson Grumbo. Petrifies if you don't have a Feather Stone and a Battle Potion in your items. Does not consume the Feather Stone or Battle Potion.

rock_smash.name: Rock Smash
rock_smash.description: Activates in Phase 1 against Crimson Grumbo. If DEF > 150, receive an additional 100 damage. Otherwise, receive additional damage equal to DEF/10.

crimson_blood.name: Crimson Blood
crimson_blood.description: Activates in Phase 2 against Crimson Grumbo. Puts the Crimson Blood active on your character. (DEF/10 + RES*2)% chance of removing the active every battle/phase. Lasts 2 turns. On the second turn, if it's still active, receive an additional 100 damage.

crimson.name: Crimson
crimson.description: Increases max chance of victory by 4%. (DEF/10 + RES*2)% chance of increasing chance of victory by 4.

regen.name: Regen
regen.description: Reduce HP loss by 3 HP every battle.

miracle.name: Miracle
miracle.description: (RES * 2)% chance to reduce damage received by 12. If you were to take damage that would reduce your HP to 0, (RES * 2)% chance to reduce your HP to 1 instead. The revive effect will not activate multiple times in a boss battle.

holy.name: Holy
holy.description: RES % chance to increase chance of victory by WIS/12 and damage by WIS/8.

armory.name: Armory
armory.description: DEF/7 % chance to increase chance of victory and damage by the amount of equips in your inventory up to a maximum of 12.

recoil.name: Recoil
recoil.description: POW/10 % chance to increase chance of victory by the difference between your WIS and DEF divided by 3 and increases damage dealt against bosses by that same difference divided by 2.

stand_your_ground.name: Stand Your Ground
stand_your_ground.description: DEF/8 % chance to outright win against Grumbos who are lower level than you. Against bosses, DEF/8 % chance to reduce damage received by 7.

grab_bag.name: Grab Bag
grab_bag.description: 66% chance to increase experience gained by 10 or gold gained by 25.

lifesteal.name: Lifesteal
lifesteal.description: 75% chance to reduce damage received by 2% of POW.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: Higher chance of activation the lower the HP you are. Increases chance of victory by POW/12. Against bosses, deal extra damage equal to POW/5.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: WIS/11% chance to increase damage by WIS/2. No effect in regular battles.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: RES% chance to reduce damage received by WIS/12. Can heal if damage reduced is more than damage received.

power_of_wealth.name: Power of Wealth
power_of_wealth.description: (LUK * 0.8)% chance of increasing chance of victory by amount of gold held divided by 1500 and damage dealt by amount of gold held divided by 150.

quick_step.name: Quick Step
quick_step.description: SPD% chance to increase chance of victory by 4%.

shield_bash.name: Shield Bash
shield_bash.description: 5% chance to increase damage dealt by DEF/3.

study.name: Study
study.description: 12% chance to increase class exp by 1. If you were to get more class exp than needed to level up a class, does not grant the extra 1 class exp. Doesn't work against bosses.

iron_pendant.name: Iron Pendant
iron_pendant.description: Prevents petrify and bleed. Petrify or Bleed that is already active will remain active. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

trip_mine.name: Trip Mine
trip_mine.description: Deals 10 damage. Doesn't do anything in regular battles, but it's duration will still be reduced. Consumed after use.

grumbo_whistle.name: Grumbo Whistle
grumbo_whistle.description: Pay 94 gold every activation to either reduce damage received by 5 or deal an extra 20 damage. Does nothing if you don't have enough gold. Still activates in regular battles. Use to activate indefinitely. Use again to deactivate.

root.name: Root
root.description: Reduces SPD by 10. If you are a Rogue, you cannot be rooted. If you were already rooted, the root still takes effect.

show_me_your_mixtape.name: Show me your Mixtape
show_me_your_mixtape.description: If you do not have (12 - phase #) actives, chance of phase victory and damage done is reduced by 64.

disco_inferno.name: Disco Inferno
disco_inferno.description: Deals 6 damage. From phase 4 onward, heals for the difference between his WIS and your WIS (heals for 0 if you have more). That same difference % chance to deal 60 damage.

adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
adrenaline.description: If you have less than or equal to 10 HP at the beginning of the battle/phase, recover 20 HP at the end of it. Item is consumed after use but the active doesn't get used up until it activates. Activates only once per boss battle.

stimulus.name: Stimulus
stimulus.description: If you have less than or equal to 20 HP at the beginning of the battle/phase, deal 40 damage at the end of it. Damage is not reduced by phase loss. Item is consumed after use but the active doesn't get used up until it activates. Activates only once per boss battle.

guardian_angel.name: Guardian Angel
guardian_angel.description: When taking lethal damage, 10% chance to revive with HP equal to your RES. Can activate multiple times.

strategize.name: Strategize
strategize.description: If the total bonus increases to your battle chance is less than 6%, reduce damage dealt by 100. Can heal the boss.

gate_of_grumbo.name: Gate of Grumbo
gate_of_grumbo.description: Every 5 phases, (SPD+LUK)*2 % chance for Master Grumbo to reduce your damage received by 50. Otherwise, Master Grumbo will reduce his damage received by 150. Can heal the boss.

evaluation.name: Evaluation
evaluation.description: Every 4 phases, if the difference between your POW/WIS is less than 45, receive 45 damage. Otherwise, that same difference % chance to reduce your damage recieved by 15.

teaching.name: Teaching
teaching.description: Master Grumbo's regular attack every phase. Deal an additional 10 damage. Reduced by a random number between 0 and your SPD. Can be reduced below 0.

master_grumbos_protection.name: Master Grumbo's Protection
master_grumbos_protection.description: If you were to take lethal damage, 25% chance to negate both your damage and the enemies damage and instead deal damage equal to your RES. Can activate multiple times.

conceal.name: Conceal
conceal.description: SPD% chance to reduce damage by 5 and deal 10 extra damage.

blessed.name: Blessed
blessed.description: 0.7% chance to permanently increase a random stat by 1. Does not activate against bosses.
